AssertionError: Expected 'Incorrect base64 string' error, got Error: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:60181/store/v3/messages?hashes=%23%23%23INVALID%23%23%23&pageSize=50&ascending=true with response: b'Exception converting hex string to bytes: hex string must have even length'
